org.apache.ant:ant.description: As mitigation for CVE-2020-1945 Apache Ant 1.10.8 changed the permissions of temporary files it created so that only the current user was allowed to access them. Unfortunately the fixcrlf task deleted the temporary file and created a new one without said protection, effectively nullifying the effort. This would still allow an attacker to inject modified source files into the build process.
org.apache.ant:ant.name: CVE-2020-11979
org.apache.ant:ant.title: CVE-2020-11979 - org.apache.ant:ant

opencv-python.description: Heap buffer overflow in libwebp in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.187 and libwebp 1.3.2 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory write via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Critical)
opencv-python.name: CVE-2023-4863
opencv-python.title: CVE-2023-4863 - opencv-python
